goals__remit: the main goals are the environment, the cooperation and the protected areas. We have a group of researcher and some technicians on the ground working for protected areas and local administrations. We also are involved in education, civil protection, ecosystem services, PES, resilient city, marine ecosystem, food, rural areas, landscape, renewable energy. We are also IUCN member
